name: Music Moments - A Journal in Web3

metadata.name: MOMENT 01 - NYC Show Highlight Reel (1-7-23)
metadata.description:
MOMENT 01 - NYC Show Highlight Reel (1-7-23)

It's every artist's dream to have their name chanted after they sang their heart out on stage. Last month it became my reality. 

I headlined a Breaking Sound showcase at Pianos NYC in January. Energy was unreal. Support was unparalled. Incredible way to start the year.

One day, when we are performing nation-wide tours in stadiums, this will be classic footage from the archive to help us remember where we started. This is just the beginning.

--

MUSIC MOMENTS is a web3 journal of key moments in my journey as an independent artist. Every week I will add an entry to this journal in the form of an visual/audio NFT to document the journey forever on chain, and give you a peek behind the curtain. 
Thanks for coming on the ride.

--

About me:
RMS is a storyteller who merges conceptual lyricism, soulful soundscapes, and his experience as a child of Indian immigrants to bring a cinematic sound of his own to the hip hop scene.
